https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hP0I7MQCGvHCOCyZH850eWFFann.jpg A cowboy seeks to rescue, then woo, a damsel in distress. But he is constantly thwarted by the scratches, breaks, and other imperfections present in the film print itself. Broken Down Film
